testcase.name: test_toggle_unpurchased_removes_from_inventory

failure.message: AssertionError: BUG: Item 'Chicken Breast' should be REMOVED from inventory when unchecked, but it's still there assert {'amount': '8oz', 'category': 'Protein', 'expiry_date': None, 'item': 'Chicken Breast', ...} is None

testcase.failure: tests/test_inventory_features.py:211: in test_toggle_unpurchased_removes_from_inventory assert item_after is None, f"BUG: Item '{item_name}' should be REMOVED from inventory when unchecked, but it's still there" E AssertionError: BUG: Item 'Chicken Breast' should be REMOVED from inventory when unchecked, but it's still there E assert {'amount': '8oz', 'category': 'Protein', 'expiry_date': None, 'item': 'Chicken Breast', ...} is None
